home.hero_subtitle: Jesper helps contractors with sharp, fast and precise bids.
home.card_speed_text: Streamlined process and templates so you come first.
home.jesper_body: Jesper is a bid manager with 10+ years in construction. He helps contractors and trade companies with precise estimating, clear assumptions, and bids that win — without compromising on speed or quality.
home.jesper_body2: He collaborates closely with project managers, estimators and trades to produce realistic budgets, clear interfaces and competitive bids.
home.jesper_body3: The focus is transparency, speed and quality — enabling quick, confident decisions.

about.title: About Jesper
about.intro: I help contractors and trade companies win more work with strong bids.
about.experience_text: 10+ years across estimation, tenders, and negotiations in construction.
about.approach_text: Structured, transparent, and efficient — focused on value.
about.bio_p1: Jesper has worked across general contractors and trades on bidding, quantity takeoffs and pricing for both renovation and new build projects.
about.bio_p2: He’s used to structuring tender material, clarifying assumptions and bringing transparency to estimates — giving partners and clients a solid basis for decisions.
about.bio_p3: The work is characterized by pace, quality and close dialogue, with a pragmatic view on risks, reservations and scopes.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pick the plan that fits your project.
pricing.basic_desc: For smaller bids and simple scopes.
pricing.pro_desc: For medium tenders with clear scope.
pricing.enterprise_desc: For complex tenders and framework agreements.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Tell me briefly about your project — I’ll respond quickly.

form.name: Name
form.consent: I consent to my data being processed for contact.
